content: > hidden falls headband is part of the hidden falls > collection in 2024 three new designs > will be added featuring blue sky > fibers woolstok yarn the collection > will include a total of 8 designs > > purchase the collection/ebook early to > receive all designs each release you will receive an update at the current price as each design is > released the price will adjust so jump in early > > pattern is also available at > shopfactorygirl com 1 > > sign up for the factory girl > newsletter to receive sneak peeks of > new patterns exclusive introductory > discounts video tutorials and other > things we know you ll love 2 1 https //www shopfactorygirl com/shop 2 https //factorygirl myflodesk com hidden falls headband this headband is perfect for using up your worsted weight scraps and is a quick beginner colorwork project with shorter floats and using no more than two colors per round charts for 3 or 5 color options mix and match - the possibilities are endless be sure to check out the other coordinating designs in the hidden falls collection **yarn** designed for worsted weight yarn uses 52 yd / 48 m sample knit in blue sky fibers woolstok 100% fine highland wool 123 yd / 112 m 50 g in storm cloud mc blue sky fibers woolstok bundle kit in cool 21 mini hanks 100% fine highland wool 12yds / 11m 5g each each kit includes 3 mini hanks of 7 different shades mc 1301 storm cloud 16 yd / 15 m c1 1306 wild thyme 12 yd / 11 m c2 1320 spring ice 6 yd / 5 5 m c3 1309 earth ivy 6 yd / 5 5 m c4 1318 thermal spring 12 yd / 11 m **dimensions** 4 5 h x 17 5 circumference / 12 cm x 42 5 cm note this may vary based on the weight of yarn used **gauge** 13 sts x 15 5 rnds = 2 / 5 cm in stockinette knit in the round blocked **needles** us 4 / 3 5 mm 16 / 60 cm circular needle us 5 / 3 75 mm 16 / 60 cm circular needle **tools** stitch marker tapestry needle **techiniques** knitting in round knit stitch colorwork
